named-query.name: propertyAdvertisement.mostRecent
named-query.query: select pa from PropertyAdvertisement pa, PremiseRegionMap prm, PremiseAggregateSetMap pasm where pa.premise = prm.premise and prm.region = :region and pa.premise = pasm.premise and pasm.aggregateSet = :aggregateSet and pa.dateListed in (select max(pa2.dateListed) from PropertyAdvertisement pa2 where pa2.premise = pa.premise and type = :type and pa2.dateListed between :startDate and :endDate group by pa2.premise)

named-query.name: propertyAdvertisement.mostRecentPrice
named-query.query: select pa.price from PropertyAdvertisement pa, PremiseRegionMap prm, PremiseAggregateSetMap pasm where pa.premise = prm.premise and prm.region = :region and pa.premise = pasm.premise and pasm.aggregateSet = :aggregateSet and pa.dateListed in (select max(pa2.dateListed) from PropertyAdvertisement pa2 where pa2.premise = pa.premise and type = :type and pa2.dateListed between :startDate and :endDate group by pa2.premise)

named-query.name: propertyAdvertisement.mostRecentInRegion
named-query.query: select pa from PropertyAdvertisement pa, PremiseRegionMap prm where pa.premise = prm.premise and prm.region = :region and pa.dateListed in (select max(pa2.dateListed) from PropertyAdvertisement pa2 where pa2.premise = pa.premise and type = :type and pa2.dateListed between :startDate and :endDate group by pa2.premise)
